description: Transcript models for mouse ES ONT direct RNA sequenceing
notes: Reads were downloaded from http://s3.amazonaws.com/nanopore-human-wgs/rna/fastq/NA12878-DirectRNA_All_Guppy_3.2.6.fastq.gz, known to have duplicates

software.name: LRModel
software.description: LRModel is a tool building genomic transcript models from long RNA reads.
